name: Your Local Bus Driver
description:
First game of "Your Local" game series.
It is a sarcastic, silly game about public transport.
(almost) Everything you have to know is in game, to pick people up you have to drive near a bus stop, open doors and wait for your future passengers to get in.

The game can be glitched very easily, i know it and i don't really want to change it because of the crappy feel it delivers (it's the point of this game series).

This game doesn't really have any goal, you can beat your highscores over and over again if you won't get bored.

Have fun.
Your Local Game Developer.
